I have been playing since 1.6. I hope to play the next one as well. Nothing better than the feeling of teamwork.

Great game, however, overlooked because of enormous amount of cheaters. Almost impossible to play on matchmaking and if a person wants to play and get better you have to use external programs like FaceIt or ESEA. When hackers are going to vanish than I believe it will be one of the best games in the history. With hackers however, it remains overlooked and worthless to play on Valve official servers
So glad they put in agent skins to make it look like fortnite, that's really what this game needed.
